summary: Implemented a UI scale settings popover in the Session sidebar header, added a localStorage-backed uiScale preference with default 100%, and applied the scale across the app via a CSS variable and transform-based wrapper. One notable gap is that the Settings control is hidden when the sidebar is collapsed.

missing_requirements.requirement: A settings button is visible in the sidebar header row (same area as the existing collapse/expand button).
missing_requirements.reason: The Settings control is conditionally rendered only when the sidebar is not collapsed, so it is not visible in the sidebar header row while collapsed.
